meanings.sent1: I am retyping my essay to fix the mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She retyped the letter to make it look neater.
meanings.sent3: After retyping the document, he realized he forgot to save it.
meanings.sent4: Retyping the email felt like rewriting history.
meanings.sent5: The sound of retyping echoed through the quiet room.

meanings.definition: The act of typing something again.
meanings.sent1: Her retyping of the report took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: The retyping of the manuscript was necessary for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The office was filled with the constant sound of retyping.
meanings.sent4: The retyping of the notes felt like a never-ending task.
meanings.sent5: The retyping process helped catch errors in the original document.
